Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE; PAINTED
Name: Vase
Description: Cylindrical vase with straight rim and walls, curvature in the lower third and flat base. The surface is cream-coloured with a coating in an orangey colour which is darker in the curvature. There is a painted decoration consisting of floral motifs with three leaves framed by wine-coloured lines which are flanked by two longitudinal lines of the same colour.
